full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM RTOG GI BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,('DIR LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, CHO RIGS PA'I STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I CHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA, JANG JUNG CHEN WANG GI SRAS LNGA, BSTAN SRID KYI RIG PA DANG LDAN PA GUNG RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG, GSO RTZIS RIG PA'I GLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHI THU TAR HANG THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS SBYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'NG, NAN TAN CHEN PO GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHREL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAntI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU 'KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYA PAN CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS PHAN PA BDE BA CHEN PO BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
